summary:
A New Two Handed Weapon
A Non Craft Able Enchanted Version
A Craft Able Non Enchanted Version
descriptionHtml:
[color=black][size=15][u][i][b]The Shadow Blade[/b][/i][/u][/size]

[size=9]Small Description[/size]
[size=6]A New Two Handed Weapon
A Non Craft Able Enchanted Version
A Craft Able Non Enchanted Version[/size]

[size=9]What Does The Mod Do[/size]
[size=6]The mod adds in a new two handed weapon, called \'Shadow Blade\', the new weapon can either be located in a stone behind the Whiteruns West Watchtower or it can be crafted at any forge once you gain the Glass Smithing perk.[/size]

[size=9]Enchanted Stats[/size]
[size=6]Damage 118
Weight 4.4
Value 22524
Enchantment; Absorb 50 points of health. Absorb 50 points of magicka. Absorb 50 points of stamina. If target dies within 300 seconds, fills a soul gem.[/size]

[size=9]Non Enchanted Stats[/size]
[size=6]Damage 118
Weight 4.4
Value 164[/size]

[size=9]How To Craft It[/size]
[size=6] 2 Refined Malachite
2 Refined Moonstone
3 Leather Strips
1 Black Soul Gem
1 Daedra Heart[/size][/color]
author: Enoomnai
